title: deezn9
author: deezn9
content: I've wondered this forever... Is there a way to hire a company, say like in India or something, to up your google business ratings? I've never heard of anything like this but there's gotta be someone out there doing it.

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: deezn9 on February 23, 2023, 02:20:00 AMI've wondered this forever... Is there a way to hire a company, say like in India or something, to up your google business ratings? I've never heard of anything like this but there's gotta be someone out there doing it.What exactly do you mean by "up your rating"? Is it  To help make the business good/better/reputable in order to organically increase the rating, To add rating features for satisfied customers to give positive rating or You just want fake ratings?I will advice you to avoid the latter and go for the first or/and second which could cost you little to nothing if you know what you are doing. But if you insist on hiring, go for people who can make the business better, or/and add rating features for customers

comments.author: mich
comments.body: If you are talking bout how to improve your google ratings and google business profile https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WpCeu4ezaeI&t=1sI am familiar with 3 of them trygmr.com, birdeye.com, and reputation.com.

comments.author: deezn9
comments.body: I'm sorry I should have been more specific.  I mean a company you could hire to provide you with positive reviews, not necessarily how to make your landing page link show up higher in google results.  I wouldn't think this service would be advertised, as I think google would squash it.

comments.author: nioctib_100
comments.body: There are dozens in India and elsewhere, but it's a fraudulent practice that Google tracks for and will catch easily. Once caught trying to scam Google, they'll remove and blacklist your business (and possibly other businesses you start) from the Google search. Google famously shut down Rap Genius for this sort of stuff about a decade ago, and it nearly crushed their business: http://tcrn.ch/1gXbVZN
